message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but $170 is my bottom line.  This product is of exceptional quality and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the price.
I understand that you're confident in the product's quality, but I'm still not comfortable with $170. I'm willing to meet you at $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me at this price?
